direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check the state of the collections but return different results (size vs. emptiness).
Both methods iterate over the collections to perform their respective operations (size calculation vs. element presence check).
Both methods involve iterating over the collections and handling their elements, though for different purposes (size calculation vs. array creation).
The size method is indirectly affected by the add method, as adding elements changes the size of the collections.
The size method is indirectly affected by the remove method, as removing elements changes the size of the collections.
The size method is indirectly affected by the clear method, as clearing the collections resets their size to zero.
